data.title: Data Cable​
data.availSteps:
•  Collect the offer from TCP App​
  •  Click on ‘Shop Now’ to buy products of your choice​
  •  Offer is auto-applied at checkout page ​
data.termsandconditions:
•  Offer is applicable only on room booking from TCP App​
  •  Points will be awarded to customer only post checkout​
  •  This offer cannot be clubbed with any other existing offers ​
  •  The offer can be availed only once per user​
  •  In case of product return, amount will be refunded to the customer via the same payment instrument used during purchase​
  •  In case of product return, loyalty points awarded to the customer will be cancelled​
  •  TCP & Croma reserve the rights to amend the T&C, end the offer, or call back any of the offers without prior notice​
